alert.note: Alert for Banner; Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Scotts Bluff, west central Morrill and northeastern Banner Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 613 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Scottsbluff Airport, or near Scottsbluff, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsbluff, Gering, Bayard, Terrytown, Minatare, Chimney Rock State Park, Moomaws Corner, Scottsbluff Airport, Scotts Bluff National Monument, South Bayard Junction, Melbeta and McGrew. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
